title: The Beauty’s Secret - Novel Updates
tags: Androgynous Characters   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Nobles   Secrets   Shounen-Ai Subplot
author: Kitaseno Yunaki   北瀬野ゆなき
description:
Earl’s son Julius Rosenberg has two secrets.

First is the open secret that, despite being born a woman, he was brought up as a man to succeed the Earldom which lacks an heir.

People called “him” the Beautiful Crossdresser, and were charmed by his dubious, androgynous appeal.

In addition, the second secret is…

The first secret is actually a misunderstanding.>
